statements: UPDATE financial_transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.75, transaction_date = '2022-04-15' WHERE transaction_id = 'a1b2c3d4e5f6a7b8c9';
UPDATE financial_transactions SET merchant_name = 'ExampleMart', is_fraud = TRUE WHERE card_number = '1234567890123456';
UPDATE financial_transactions SET transaction_amount = 100.50, merchant_name = 'Amazon' WHERE card_number = '1234567890123456';
UPDATE financial_transactions SET is_fraud = true, transaction_date = '2021-10-20 08:00:00' WHERE transaction_id = 'f8c16269-384f-4de2-b04c-35eb0f227eac';
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 100.50, transaction_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE transaction_id = '6b288e42-49bb-4e06-9449-0e0064919d78';
UPDATE fraud_detection SET fraud_detection_result = true WHERE fraud_id = '37ad5a67-3333-4f14-8b23-6fd8c6c5cd65';
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 1000, transaction_date = '2022-01-10 12:00:00' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE fraud_detection SET fraud_detection_result = TRUE WHERE fraud_id = '9876abcd-5432-1a2b-0987-234567876543';
UPDATE transactions SET fraud_flag = true WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance - 200.50 WHERE account_id = 2020;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 150.75, fraud_flag = true WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance - 500.00, account_status = 'closed' WHERE account_id = 2001;
UPDATE financial_accounts SET account_balance = 15000.50, account_type = 'Savings' WHERE account_id = 101;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_date = '2022-08-15', transaction_amount = 2500.75 WHERE transaction_id = 201;
UPDATE financial_accounts SET account_balance = account_balance + 1000 WHERE account_id = 12345
UPDATE fraud_detection SET is_fraud = TRUE, reason = 'Unusual activity detected' WHERE transaction_id = 54321
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1500.75, transaction_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = 5000.25, last_transaction_date = '2022-07-01' WHERE account_id = 2002;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1500.00, fraud_flag = true WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = 5000.00, last_transaction_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE account_id = 201;
